attributes.action: Ban animal testing, and use more ethical testing methods. Issue a deadline by which no animal testing should be carried out after.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i believe that there are far more ethical methods of testing rather than using animals. also tests carried out on animals are not always beneficial to humans as animals and people react in different ways to treatments and situations.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
